question.title: Failed to configure DataSource:'url' attribute is not specified & no embedded datasource configure Reason: Failed to determine a suitable driver class
question.body:
I am creating first spring boot project using Eclipse, I have generated project with help of Spring Initilizr. now I am getting this error "Failed to configure a DataSource: 'url' attribute is not specified and no embedded datasource could be configured. Reason: Failed to determine a suitable driver class Action: Consider the following: If you want an embedded database (H2, HSQL or Derby), please put it on the classpath. If you have database settings to be loaded from a particular profile you may need to activate it (no profiles are currently active).
Printscreen Exception
Printscreen application.properties

This is the code that I have written.

I am creating my first spring boot project and at the start of learning phase I got this error.
